purpose: To illustrate how Mastercard's postal code analysis can identify specific segments and inform campaigns.
title: Advertising Insights Postal Code Analysis: Reach specific prospect groups through modelled propensity to spend

bullets.text: Choose from Mastercard’s 170 standard segments, such as “Online Audio Subscription Services: Likely to spend 2+ times the average at on audio subscription services”
Or, create a custom segment, such as “Likely to spend heavily with a set of competitors”
Mastercard draws from its transaction database and identifies the aggregate group of cardholders that fit the segment of interest
Mastercard identifies the residential postal codes in which the cardholder group resides
Users have the option to receive a one-time delivery of ranked postal codes per segment selected, or to refresh the listing on a monthly basis
Users also have the option to feed the postal code targeting data into Mastercard’s campaign delivery service

layout: Two-column layout with headers and bullet points

tables.title: Example of 170 Standard Segment Descriptions
tables.description: Categorizes segments into different types of propensities and likelihoods.

cells: Home Furnishings & Furniture Stores: Likely to spend 2+ times the average at home furnishing and furniture retailers
Automotive Fuel: Likely to transact 2+ times the average on automotive gas
Automotive Card Buyers: At least 2x as likely to purchase at retailers of new and pre-owned automobiles within next 30 days
Valentine’s Day Shopper Flowers: Likely to spend 2+ times the average at florists during the 2 weeks before Valentine’s Day
Online Audio Subscription Services: Likely to spend 2+ times the average on audio subscription services
Online Grocery Stores: Likely to transact 2+ times the average at online grocery stores
Cellular & Wireless Devices: At least 2x as likely to purchase at retailers of cell phones, cell phone plans, and wireless devices within the next 30 days
Black Friday – Cyber Monday Electronics: Likely to spend 2+ times the average at electronics stores on Black Friday through Cyber Monday each year
